# Exclusive Perks for Members

being a superteam member comes with many perks, check them out below.

Live Now

## Hrdalo & Krnic Legal Services

Up to 100% discounts on legal services and consulting sessions from Hrdalo &
Krnic law firm. DM @josipvolarevic on Telegram for more details.

[ ](https://www.hkod.hr/post/hrdalo-krnic-law-firm-partners-with-superteam-
balkan-to-bring-relaxed-legal-to-solana)

## Preferential Access to Instagrants

We will recommend high quality applications from Superteam Members to the
grantor teams.

[ ](https://earn.superteam.fun/grants/)

## w3.hub

15% discount on Flex Desks for the first 3 months.

[ ](https://twitter.com/w3_fund/status/1751939077148979375)

## Sec3

Discounted access (code: SUPERTEAM) + extra scans for open sourced projects

[ ](https://www.sec3.dev/)

## Crypto Tax Calculator

Discounted access (code: SUPERTEAM15) on your tax calculation.

[ ](https://cryptotaxcalculator.io/)

## Webacy

50% lifetime discount on the Webacy Pro Plan. Discount Code: SUPERTEAM24

[ ](https://dapp.webacy.com/)

## Exclusive Earning with RFPs

Preferential access for Members with high XP for RFPs put out by Superteam and
our partners (like Solana Foundation, Backpack, etc.)

[ ](https://in.superteam.fun/open-rfps)

## FYEO

40% off on audits, threat monitoring, and dynamic wallet testing

[ ](https://www.fyeo.io/superteam-partnership)

## Preferential Access to Fellowships

Expedited application process for cohorts and fellowships held through
Superteam (e.g: Solana India Fellowship, Taptive Writers' Cohort, etc.)

## Community Calls

Invite-only weekly events with the rest of the Superteam community.

[ ](https://lu.ma/superteam)

## Job Placements

Members with high XP get bespoke career consulting and recruiting support by
our partners at BEExperience.

[ ](https://beexperience.io/)

## Pizza Fund - Events and Workshops

Microgrants of up to $200 USDC to organize Solana and Superteam adjacent meet-
ups.

[ ](https://earn.superteam.fun/listings/grants/superteam-pizza-fund/)

## Cudis

Members get a special discount for the CUDIS AI-empowered smart ring. To
claim, connect the wallet with your Member NFT.

[ ](https://www.cudis.xyz/)

## Orange DAO

Expedited Review for the Orange DAO Fellowship S24

[ ](https://fam.orangedao.xyz/superteam)

## Ironforge

Free access to the Ironforge Pro Tier plan for 2 months (code: SUPERTEAM)

[ ](https://www.ironforge.cloud/)

## SpringX Solana Accelerator

We will recommend our best teams to the SpringX Accelerator Program kicking
off at the Solana APAC Summit in Malaysia in June 2024.

[ ](https://www.springx.net/join)

## Project Advisory

Get mentorship and support as you build your project across development,
product, and fundraising.

Completed

## Code Wallet

Early Access to Code, the simplest way to send money. (code: superteam)

[ ](https://www.getcode.com)

## Breakpoint Tickets

Members with high XP got a free ticket to Breakpoint 2023 held in Amsterdam,
Netherlands in November 2023.

[ ](https://solana.com/breakpoint)

## $DEAN Airdrop

500 $DEAN (Native token of the Deanslist community)

[ ](https://deanmachine.medium.com/wen-one-of-us-sir-deans-list-token-
airdrop-9436d01bb447)

## Mad Lads WL

1 Mad Lads WL spot

[ ](https://www.madlads.com)

## Holaplex

5000 credits for Holaplex's HUB product that you can use to easily launch NFT
campaigns, mint digital collectibles, run loyalty programs, and more.

[ ](https://www.holaplex.com/)

## Helius Access

30% off on Helius' RPC services (Open a ticket in their discord and show your
member NFT to claim)

[ ](https://www.helius.dev/)

## $BERN Airdrop

10,000 $BERN, the first coin built on the Solana Token-2022 standard.

[
](https://twitter.com/bonkearn/status/1662481195064541189?s=46&t=iQOfgRYukk1lwbkNIGAzrw)

## Shyft

Free access to the Shyft Launch plan for 2 months.

[ ](https://shyft.to/)

## $DWH Airdrop

4606 $DWH

[ ](https://www.devwifhat.xyz/)

## $SAROS Airdrop

50k $SAROS

[ ](https://blog.saros.finance/saros-community-airdrop-first-wave/)

## .superteam Domain

.superteam domain name through AllDomains, the decentralized protocol for your
Web3 ID

[ ](https://twitter.com/AllDomains_/status/1692161236719321263)

## Backpack Invite Codes

Early access to Backpack, the next generation crypto wallet.

[ ](https://www.backpack.app)

## $BLAZE Airdrop

6200 $BLZE

[ ](https://solblaze.org/)

## $L Airdrop

11389 $L

[ ](https://lorm.wtf/)

## Flash Beasts WL

1 Flash Beasts WL spot for Superteam India Members (Top 20 by XP)

[ ](https://twitter.com/FlashTrade_/status/1735388315501863347)

## Juno Finance Invite Codes

Exclusive access to a US bank account setup through Juno

[ ](https://juno.finance/)

## Chainstack

Free access to the Chainstack Growth Plan for 2 months.

[ ](https://chainstack.com)

## Descrypt

30% off on crypto tax filing services (code: SUPERTEAM30)

[ ](https://www.descrypt.com/)

## $BONK Airdrop

25 Billion $BONK

[ ](https://www.bonkcoin.com/)

Coming Soon

## Irys (prev. Bundlr)

Irys enables users to scale permanent data. Data storage with Irys is
permanent, precise, and unconstrained.

[ ](https://irys.xyz/)

## Superteam Dealflow

Global Superteam members seeking venture capital are featured in a weekly
newsletter sent to our network of investing partners.

[ ](https://airtable.com/appKu5Z2R3sxR16hK/shrPPmeQSLVZH5b0S)

## Merch

Ridiculously comfortable. Ludicrously goodlooking. Only available for Members.

## Business Incorporation

The Superteam community will support you in getting your company incorporated,
obtain a business license, and all the essentials to launch your crypto
business successfully.
